title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\OperationProgress
name: OperationProgress
description:
Information about operation (or operation stage) progress.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.OperationProgress

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: A non-parameterized string describing an operation stage. Unset for single-stage operations.

params.name: data.status
params.description: Status of an operation stage. Unset for single-stage operations.

params.name: data.metrics
params.description: Progress metric bundle, for example: metrics: [{name: "nodes done", int_value: 15}, {name: "nodes total", int_value: 32}] or metrics: [{name: "progress", double_value: 0.56}, {name: "progress scale", double_value: 1.0}]

params.name: data.stages
params.description: Substages of an operation or a stage.
